backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing rooms, players, chat messages, and phase transitions with create, join, start game, get state, and send message methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling screen routing and automatic phase-based transitions using room state polling.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useCreateRoom: React Query mutation for creating rooms with generated codes and updating session state.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useJoinRoom.t: React Query mutation for joining an existing room with error handling and session updates.
Polling hook that fetches room state every 2 seconds using React Query.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useSendMessag: Mutation hook for sending chat messages and refreshing room state.
Mutation hook for starting the game, validating host, and triggering state refresh.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/AppHea: Header component showing title, subtitle, username badge, and room code.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/ChatCo: Chat input component with validation and send button for submitting messages.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/ChatMe: Renders a scrollable chat message list, auto-scrolls to bottom, and styles messages based on sender.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/ErrorB: Displays a styled destructive alert with an optional title and error message.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/Screen: Provides a page layout wrapper with a gradient background and a fixed footer.
frontend/src/echoshift/identity/playerId: Generates a unique player ID and stores/retrieves it from localStorage.
frontend/src/echoshift/identity/useLocal: Ensures a username exists via state, generating one if missing, and provides a reset function.
frontend/src/echoshift/identity/username: Generates random adjective-animal-number usernames and validates them against a naming pattern.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/GameChatS: Shows the in-game chat UI, personality instructions, and handles sending chat messages.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/GuessingS: Displays the guessing phase with different messages for anchor vs. non-anchor players.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/HomeScree: Home lobby where users view/change their username and create or join rooms.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/LobbyScre: Shows lobby status, player list, host controls, and start-game conditions.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/ResultsSc: Displays anchor and weird players with their traits and offers a return-home action.
frontend/src/echoshift/state/session.ts: Zustand store managing player/session data with persistence and reset logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and theme extensions using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, MVP goals, existing features, and architectural notes for the EchoShift app.
